message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe would significantly enhance the value of your business. Considering its worth to you, I propose an initial offer of $1,250,000. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also the potential benefits it could bring to your operations. I look forward to your response.

Alice, thanks for the offer, but $1,250,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  Considering the value to me, I'd be willing to pay $1,100,000.  This would be a fair price for both of us and allow us to move forward.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on our discussion, I am pleased to counteroffer at $1,150,000 for the product. This price reflects a compromise between our respective positions and aims to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. I hope this proposal aligns with your expectations and allows us to move forward towards a successful agreement.
